name: @you-got-bud/google-custom-search-node
description: Query Google Custom Search in NodeJS With full typescript support. 0 dependencies

scripts.patch: pnpm run build && pnpm version patch && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.major: pnpm run build && pnpm version major && pnpm publish --access public
scripts.minor: pnpm run build && pnpm version minor && pnpm publish --access public

author: YouGotBud
